ThingDef.Name: MealNutrientPasteMeat
ThingDef.label: nutrient paste (meat)
ThingDef.description: A sticky slime made from meat. It's not appetizing, but it will keep you alive. The tube it comes in is made from the indigestible animal-parts, re-processed into a simple polymer, and helps prevent spoiling.

ThingDef.Name: MealNutrientBrickMeat
ThingDef.label: nutrient brick (meat)
ThingDef.description: A crumbly brick of dehydrated nutrient paste. It's not appetizing, but it will keep you alive, and it takes longer to degrade, from being dehydrated. The wrapper it comes in is the same polymer that the paste-tubes are made out of.
